ontario.title: Shatiga Cannabis ee Ontario
ontario.description: Loo baahan yahay iibiyeyaasha cannabis ee Ontario. CROL waa shatiga hawlgalkaaga ee heerka qanjadhada, CRSA waa ogolaanshaha tafaariiqda ee heerka dukaanka.
ontario.crolHelpText: Nambarada shatiga hawlgalkaaga ee OCS heerka qanjadhada
ontario.domainVerifiedSuccess: âœ“ Domain la Xaqiijiyey - domain-ka email-kaagu wuxuu u dhigma website-ka CRSA. Dukaankaaga ugu horreeya ayaa si otomaatig ah loogu samayn doonaa shatigan.
ontario.licenseLabel: Nambarada Shatiga Tafaariiqda Cannabis ee Ontario
ontario.licenseHelpText: Geli nambarada shatiga tafaariiqda cannabis ee Ontario ee AGCO
ontario.validatedSuccess: âœ“ Shatiga si Guul leh ayaa loo Xaqiijiyey
ontario.searchIntro: Ma ogtahay nambaradaada shatiga? Raadi dukaankaaga:
ontario.searchPlaceholder: Ku raadi magaca dukaanka ama cinwaanka
ontario.helpDetails: Waxaad ka heli kartaa nambaradahaaga shatiga:
ontario.helpCrol: â€¢ Nambarada CROL: Portal-kaaga OCS B2B (loo baahan yahay in la abuuro qanjadhada)
ontario.helpCrsa: â€¢ Nambarada CRSA: Kaydka dadweynaha ee shatiga AGCO (ikhtiyaar ah - xaqiijinta otomaatigga ah ee dukaanka)
ontario.helpNote: Fiiro gaar ah: Waxaad ka booddhi kartaa xaqiijinta CRSA oo dukaammada si gacanta ah u dari kartaa markii dambe.
ontario.autoCreateStoreHelp: Dukaankan si otomaatig ah ayaa loo samayn doonaa markaad dhammaystirto isdiiwaangelinta. Waxaad ka saari kartaa calaamadda si aad u darto dukaammo gacanta markii dambe.

reject.title: Diid Akoonka
reject.description: Fadlan bixi sababta ka diidista akoonkan. Tan waxa loo diiwaan gelin doonaa ujeedooyinka xisaabaadka.

userRegistration.tenantNotFoundDescription: Tenant-ka la cayimay lama heli karo.

errors.alreadyExists: Isticmaale leh iimeylkan horeba wuu jiray. Fadlan isticmaal iimey kale ama gal.

success.title: Ku soo dhawoow WeedGo!

checkEmail.title: Hubi Iimeylkaaga
checkEmail.description: Waxaan kuu soo dirnay iimeel soo dhaweyn ah oo leh macluumaad muhiim ah oo akoon iyo tilmaamo dejin.

accessDashboard.title: Gal Dashboard-kaaga
accessDashboard.description: Gal dashboard-ka admin si aad u dejiso dejinta dukaankaaga, u darto alaabta, oo u habeeso kaaliyayaasha AI.

setupStore.title: Deji Dukaankaaga Ugu Horreeya
setupStore.description: Ku dar goobta dukaankaaga ugu horeysa, deji saacadaha howlgalka, oo dhiso qoyskaaga alaabta.

configureAI.title: Deji Kaaliyayaasha AI
configureAI.description: U habeeso shakhsiyaadka AI budtender-kaaga oo deji taageerada luuqado badan macaamiishaada.

cta.help: Ma u baahan tahay caawimo si aad u bilowdo? Xiriir kooxda taageerada

validation.websiteRequired: Mareegtu waa lagama maarmaan si loo sameeyo code-ka summadda
validation.brandCodeRequired: Code-ka summadda waa lagama maarmaan (geli mareegta si aad u sameyso)
validation.brandCodeFormat: Code-ka summaddu waa inuu kaliya ka kooban yahay xarfo waaweyn, nambarada, xargaha, iyo hoosweynaha
validation.businessNumberFormat: Lambarka ganacsiga waa inuu ahaadaa 9 nambar
validation.emailInvalid: Fadlan geli cinwaan iimeel sax ah
validation.postalCodeFormat: Fadlan geli code boosta Kanadiyaan ah oo sax ah
validation.passwordRequired: Furaha sirta ahu waa lagama maarmaan
validation.passwordLength: Furaha sirtu waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan 8 xaraf
validation.passwordComplexity: Furaha sirtu waa inuu ka kooban yahay xarfo waaweyn, xarfo yaryar, iyo nambar
validation.cardNumberFormat: Fadlan geli lambar kaarka 16-nambar ah oo sax ah
validation.cvvFormat: CVV waa inay ahaato 3 ama 4 nambar
validation.cardholderRequired: Magaca haysta kaarka waa lagama maarmaan
validation.crolNumberRequired: Lambarka CROL ayaa looga baahan yahay kireenayaasha Ontario
validation.crsaLicenseRequired: Shatiga CRSA ee sax ah ayaa looga baahan yahay kireenayaasha Ontario
validation.crsaDomainMismatch: Domain-kaaga iimaylka kuma habboonaan mareegta CRSA. Fadlan la xiriir taageerada xaqiijinta gacanta.

legal.title: Heshiisyada Sharciga iyo Caddaynta
legal.description: Fadlan dib u eeg oo ogolow heshiisyada soo socda si aad u dhammaystirto diiwaangelinkaaga

termsOfService.label: Waxaan aqbalay Shuruudaha Adeega
termsOfService.required: Waa inaad aqbashaa Shuruudaha Adeega si aad u sii waddo

privacyPolicy.label: Waxaan aqbalay Qaanuunka Sirta
privacyPolicy.required: Waa inaad aqbashaa Qaanuunka Sirta si aad u sii waddo

dataUsage.label: Waxaan oggolaadey in macluumaadka loo isticmaalo xayaysiisyada AI-ku-bartilmaameedka ah ee soo-saarayaasha khannadda ee shatiga leh
dataUsage.description: WeedGo waxay dakhli ka heshaa xayaysiisyo AI-ku-bartilmaameedka ah oo ka imanaya soo-saarayaasha khannadda ee shatiga leh. Macluumaadka isticmaalkaaga ayaa la sii wadi doonaa si loo bixiyo talooyinka badeecada ku habboon iyo waxyaabaha xayaysiinta.
dataUsage.required: Waa inaad oggolaataa isticmaalka xogta si aad u sii waddo

accurateInfo.label: Waxaan xaqiijinayaa in dhammaan macluumaadka la bixiyey uu sax yahay oo dhammaystiran yahay
accurateInfo.description: Waxaad caddaynaysaa in dhammaan macluumaadka la gudbiyey foomkan diiwaan-gelinta uu run yahay, sax yahay, oo dhammaystiran yahay ilaa inta aad ogtahay.

authorization.label: Waxaa iga fasaxay ururkaygii inaan abuurto akoonkan
authorization.description: Waxaad xaqiijinaysaa inaad leedahay awood sharci ah iyo ogolaansho ka timid ururkaaga si aad ugu diiwaangashid adeegyada WeedGo oo aad u gasho heshiiskan magaca shirkaddaada.
authorization.required: Waa inaad xaqiijisaa ogolaanshahaaga si aad u sii waddo

legal.allRequired: Dhammaan caddayntu waa in la aqbalaa si loo abuuro akoonkaaga
